document_data.mainbody: '''Polyhedron (Deutsche Ausgabe) Magazine #2''' was released in 1999. It contained the following articles related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:
document_data.Elminsters Erzählungen:
{{Main|The Everwinking Eye}}
: ''By [[Ed Greenwood]].'' '''p. 4–7'''
A translation of the [[Polyhedron]] column [[The Everwinking Eye]] to German. The article translated was one of the [[Mulmaster]] articles by [[Ed Greenwood]].
